content:
Here's the revised agreement based on your latest version:

AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM ACCEPTANCE AGREEMENT

This agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of [Date] between Shannon Bennett ("Customer"), AirSmart Pty Ltd. ("AirSmart"), and Vuka Air ("Installer").

WHEREAS, AirSmart has supplied an air conditioning system ("System") to Shannon Bennett, and Vuka Air has installed the System at the premises of Shannon Bennett located at 10 Border St, Byron Bay NSW 2481; and

WHEREAS, Shannon Bennett has inspected the System and acknowledges that it is fully installed and functioning correctly.

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual promises and covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:

1. Acceptance of System: Shannon Bennett hereby accepts the System as fully installed and functioning correctly.
2. Warranty: The System is covered by a warranty provided by the manufacturer, which will be honored by AirSmart to the extent permitted by the manufacturer.
3. Payment: Shannon Bennett has paid in full for the installation of the System, as set forth in the invoice provided by AirSmart.
4. Liability: AirSmart and Vuka Air shall not be liable for any damages or losses incurred by Shannon Bennett as a result of the use of the System, except as provided in the warranty provided by the manufacturer.
5. Maintenance: Shannon Bennett is responsible for the ongoing maintenance of the System, including regular cleaning and filter replacement.
6. Termination: This Agreement shall terminate upon expiration of the warranty provided by the manufacturer.
7. Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the System is installed.
8. Counterparts: This Agreement may be executed in counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the same instrument.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.

Shannon Bennett AirSmart Pty Ltd.
Signature Signature

Vuka Air
Signature

Date: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ Date: \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
